title: Effect of contractionary FP and expansionary MP

content.question: If a contractionary fiscal policy is followed by an expansionary monetary policy, nominal interest rate and employment would most likely be affected in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label:
Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Increase
 Increase

Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Increase
 Decrease

Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Decrease
 Decrease

Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Decrease
 Indeterminate

Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Indeterminate
 Decrease

content.answer:
Nominal Interest Rate
 Employment

Decrease
 Indeterminate

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
